de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.message

Class ConnectResponseMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.message.Message
      • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.message.ResponseMessage
        • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.message.ConnectResponseMessage

  • public class ConnectResponseMessage
extends ResponseMessage
    Class implements SLNP connect response message. A connect response message has the following format: CODE SLNP s..s@Version: s..s@pid: n..n@charset:s..s@ssl:s..s
    Author:
    Patrick Rogalla

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.message.ResponseMessage

      ConnectResponseMessage(java.lang.String msg)

      Extracts the data from the parsed message.

      Returns the charset the server encodes the data when communicating with the client.

      Returns the SLNP server name.
